Hi, I hope you're doing well.

I was born and raised in a small town south of Boston MA. I took quite the peculiar route through school, finishing a Bachelor's in Math and CS at the Harvard Extension School during my Junior year of high school. I then hopped straight into a Physics Master's program at UMass Dartmouth. I recieved my degree in May of 2023.




I have always sought a deep understanding of everything around me. I am always looking for ways to become smarter, and apply my intelligence to every facet of my life.

I would describe my (attempted) aesthetic as a mix between a Buddhist Monk, a Crazy Math Professor, and David Goggins :)
